dy_duration.componentleveltooltip: The Underway Teleportation can only be used after the cooldown duration

component_text.text:
[[img:icon_army]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Select one of your armies to instantly travel across the map using the Underway Network

[[img:icon_underway_network]][[/img]] [[col:green]]The travelling army must start in a region where the Underway Network has been restored

[[img:icon_turns]][[/img]] [[col:green]]The Underway Network has a cooldown period between uses

\n\n[[i]]The conclusion of Legendary Grudges allows the restoration of vast sections of the Underway, putting to use the old network connecting the Great Holds. Once again the throngs shall march underground as the crow flies![[/i]]
